meanings.definition: The act of despoiling or plundering.
meanings.sent1: The despoilment of the village left the residents devastated.
meanings.sent2: The despoilment of the treasure chest revealed its hidden contents.
meanings.sent3: The despoilment of the picnic basket by the mischievous raccoon caused laughter among the campers.
meanings.sent4: The despoilment of her innocence by the harsh realities of life was a painful experience.
meanings.sent5: The despoilment of the once lush forest by logging activities was a stark reminder of human impact on nature.

meanings.definition: The state of being despoiled or plundered.
meanings.sent1: The despoilment of the kingdom led to widespread poverty among its people.
meanings.sent2: The despoilment of the garden left it barren and lifeless.
meanings.sent3: The despoilment of the cookie jar by the hungry children was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The despoilment of her happiness by constant criticism made her reevaluate her relationships.
meanings.sent5: The despoilment of the once vibrant city by war was a haunting sight.
